sections.description: Summarizes the utilization rates and percentages for different categories of chassis usage (Street-MH, Street-EVG, Terminal, Grand Total). It provides a high-level overview of how effectively the chassis are being used.
sections.notes: Calculates utilization rates and percentages based on different categories of chassis usage.

sections.description: Breaks down the costs associated with EVG operations into M&R, Admin, and Repo categories, both in total dollars and on a per-usage-day and per-contributed-day basis. This section helps understand the cost structure of EVG.
sections.notes: Provides a detailed cost breakdown for EVG operations.

sections.description: Forecasts revenue and usage days for various categories (Trucker Street, EVG Street, Terminal) over a 10-year period. It also includes annual inflation assumptions for different rates.
sections.notes: Includes annual inflation assumptions for Trucker Rate, EVG Rate, Terminal Rate, M&R Cost, Admin Cost, Repo Cost, and Other Cost.

sections.description: Summarizes the total revenue and provides a breakdown of costs per usage day for EVG Street and Terminal operations. It calculates average costs per day for different categories.
key_components: EVG Average Cost per EVG Usage Day
EVG Average Cost per EVG Street Day
EVG Terminal Cost per Terminal Day
sections.notes: Calculates average costs per day for different categories.

sections.description: Details the costs per usage day for various expense categories, including M&R, Admin, Repo, Other, and Lease Costs. This section provides a granular view of daily operational expenses.
key_components: Lease Cost per Day on EVG Chassis
Lease Cost per Day on EVG Leases
Incremental Pool Overuse Cost per Day
sections.notes: Provides a detailed breakdown of costs on a per-usage-day basis.

sections.description: Calculates the total costs for various expense categories, including M&R, Admin, Repo, Other, Bad Debt, and Lease Costs. It also includes Gain Sharing with EVG on MH Conversion and calculates the Total Cost.
key_components: Lease Cost on EVG Owned Chassis
Lease Cost on EVG Existing Leases
Gain Sharing with EVG on MH Conversion
sections.notes: Calculates total costs for various expense categories.

sections.description: Analyzes EBITDA, EBITDA per Usage Day, EBITDA per Chassis per Day, and EBITDA Margin (%). This section provides key profitability metrics.

Details the costs associated with acquiring chassis, including the price per chassis, payment to EVG, sales tax, reconditioning costs, decoupling costs, repositioning, retitling & stenciling costs, working capital investment, offhire costs, and scrap chassis value. It also calculates the Total Effective Purchase Price.
key_components: Less: Scrap Chassis at $1,000 per Chassis
sections.notes: Details the costs associated with acquiring chassis.

sections.description: Calculates the Cash Multiple of 2014 EBITDA - Owned. This provides a valuation metric for the acquisition.

Calculates the cash flows based on a depreciated value exit scenario over a 10-year period. It includes Investment, Accelerated Depreciation, EBIT, Cash Taxes, Cash Income, WC Investment, Capex, and Cash Flow. It also calculates Unlevered IRR and NPV.
sections.notes: Calculates cash flows based on a depreciated value exit scenario.

sections.description: Calculates the cash flows based on a TEV (Total Enterprise Value) exit scenario over a 5-year period. It includes Investment, Accelerated Depreciation, EBIT, Cash Taxes, Cash Income, WC Investment, Capex, and Cash Flow. It also calculates Unlevered IRR and NPV.
sections.notes: Calculates cash flows based on a TEV exit scenario.
